title: 40 Repurposing Plastic Straw Crafts Ideas - Bored Art
body: 40 Repurposing Plastic Straw Crafts Ideas August 25, 2019 Pinterest The rate at which we are producing waste is alarming! Moreover, it is alarming because the maximum of this waste is not degradable.

summary:
The text expresses concern about the alarming rate of non-degradable waste produced, specifically plastic straws. It suggests repurposing plastic straws into crafts as a solution to the problem. The sentiment of the text is environmentally conscious and proactive in finding creative ways to reduce waste. 
Sentiment: 0.8
